caption:
This photograph depicts a busy and crowded parking lot scene, likely from the 1970s, based on the styles of cars and fashion. The lot is packed with a variety of vehicles, including sedans, station wagons, and a few motorcycles. The cars exhibit an array of colors and styles, indicative of the automotive design trends of the time, such as sharp angles and prominent chrome details.

In the background, a muted-tone brick building is visible, possibly a school or a public building, given the presence of several yellow school buses parked in a row near the building. A small group of people can be seen walking and interacting around the buses. 

In the foreground and scattered throughout the parking lot, there are multiple groups of people, mainly young adults, suggesting that this may be a college or university parking lot. The individuals are dressed in typical casual attire of the era, including jeans, jackets, and layered clothing. 

Overall, the atmosphere is lively and bustling, capturing a typical day at a busy educational or public facility, highlighted by the diversity of vehicles and a glimpse of social interaction among the people present.
title: Woodward High School in Bethesda, MD. Many students drive their own cars to school. School buses in background.
